en_text: For 2 turns, increase ATK by 30% for each Enhance when HP is below 50% awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: 機動天使
jp_skill.raw_description: 2ターンの間、チーム内のHP50％以下強化の 覚醒数に応じて攻撃力が上昇。

kr_skill.name: 기동천사
kr_skill.raw_description: 2턴 동안 팀 내의 HP 50% 이하 강화의 각성수에 따라 공격력이 상승

na_skill.name: Angel Engine
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [50% or less HP Enhanced] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns
